title: Một khúc hồng trần
lyrics: Shui ba hua die xie cheng bei Shui zai qian nian deng yi hui Hong chen zong you meng He bi wen shi yu fei Li jin le cang sang Geng dong de wu hui Shui ba hua xin hua zuo lei Shui zai meng li yong xiang sui Ren sheng zhe bei jiu Zen me he dou shi zui Guo wang de yun yan Tan ran qu mian dui Leng leng de yan lei sui feng chui Cai zhi dao li bie de zi wei Duo shao han shuang duo shao xin sui Duo shao wu nai man man ti hui Piao piao de luo hua ru liu shui Cai zhi dao hua qi de zhen gui Duo shao xun mi duo shao fu lei Duo shao feng jing yi ran ni zui mei
